title: iDigital

items.title: Alphabet’s latest deal reveals the hottest area of AI right now

items.title: MicroStrategy’s stock surges as bitcoin buys resume, lifting holdings to above 600,000
items.description: MicroStrategy is buying bitcoin again after taking a one-week break. It now owns more than 600,000 bitcoin, valued at more than $73 billion.

items.title: Stop vetting engineers like it’s 2021 — the AI-native workforce has arrived
items.description: Jobs will fade and rise due to AI. But those who learn to screen, train and build dev teams around AI-enabled talent will write the future.

items.title: The human harbor: Navigating identity and meaning in the AI age
items.description: The future is marked by deepening uncertainty about our place in it, and by growing ambiguity about the nature of human purpose itself.
